name: Time To Sell
description:
Time To Sell is a text based game where you run a shop and try to keep all your customers happy. The only catch is, it's impossible to make everybody happy in retail, so you have to use the divine power to rewind time to make things right.

This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2

All programming and sound effects were handled by Brad Makes Games

All music and Art was created by Greyman, Director of Open Bracket Productions
